content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 07 (APP): Foreign Minister of TA14rkiye Hakan Fidan on Wednesday called Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister,Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar to express TA14rkiyeas solidarity with Pakistan against Indiaas unprovoked aggression, violating Pakistanas sovereignty and killing innocent civilians. According to the Ministry of Foreign Affairsa statement, the Turkiyeas FM expressed concern over the deteriorating regional security situation. However, both the leaders agreed to remain in close coordination on the evolving situation.
